opencastR 0.0.2
  • Reference

Query Opencast current organization's properties

Source: R/oc_organization_properties.R
oc_organization_properties.Rd

Returns the current organization's properties.

oc_organization_properties()

Value

A list containing the current organization's properties.

Details

This function expects the hostname, username and password to be set as environment variables.

Examples

# Set the environment variables
Sys.setenv(OPENCAST_HOST = "https://legacy.opencast.org")
Sys.setenv(OPENCAST_USERNAME = "admin")
Sys.setenv(OPENCAST_PASSWORD = "opencast")

# Get the API key characteristics
oc_organization_properties()
